1.04.name: wordpress/rakeback-widget-from-fullraketilt
1.04.description:
The Rakeback Widget from FullRakeTilt.com allows you to display a table of rakeback offers on the sidebar of your WordPress blog.

Rakeback is a special offer that poker players can receive from participating sites in which they receive a portion of the fees they play (rake) back each month if they sign up to their poker room through FullRakeTilt.com.

The FullRakeTilt.com Rakeback Widget will display all the current offer details in a table on the sidebar of your blog. If a user uses the links on your blog to register an account with FullRakeTilt.com you will receive a commission based on their rake. This commission is anywhere from 2-4% of the rake the player generates.

You will earn this commission each month the player plays.

To be able to earn commission you must first create an account on FullRakeTilt.com and be sure to include your FullRakeTilt.com username in the w
